wikipedia_page.main: Matthew White (c 1766 – 11 March 1840) was a British politician. He sat in the House of Commons of the United Kingdom as a Member of Parliament (MP) for Hythe, from 1802 to 1806 and 1812–1818.

response: Matthew White or Matt White is the name of:
* Matthew White (rugby league) (born 1984), Australian rugby league player
* Matthew White (racing driver), motorsport racing driver
* Matthew White (MP) (1766–1840), British Member of Parliament for Hythe, 1802–1806 and 1812–1818
